translations: v．贮藏，藏匿：像松鼠一样把东西藏起来。
· He was squirreling away money for his retirement.
他一直在为退休积攒钱。

sentences.sentence: She is squirreling the stuff away in one of the closets.
sentences.translation: 她正将东西藏在一个壁橱里。

sentences.sentence: By squirreling away his pocket money for several months, the boy was able to buy his own radio.
sentences.translation: 这孩子攒了几个月的零钱，现在他能买一个收音机了。

sentences.sentence: Asians (and Germans too-see article), have been squirreling their money away with excessive enthusiasm.
sentences.translation: 亚洲人(德国人也是)一直对储蓄有着过高的热情。
